DaD.dungeon

Class DungeonHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • DaD.dungeon.DungeonHolder

  • public class DungeonHolder
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton used to store all DungeonTemplate int the same place.
    See Also:
    Map

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static DungeonHolder _instance
      Private instance of class.
      private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,DungeonTemplate> _templateList
      Map containing all DungeonTemplate as value and Integer representing their id as key.

    • Constructor Summary

      Private constructor of class.

      • getTemplate

        public DungeonTemplate getTemplate(int id)
        Return a DungeonTemplate matching the given id.
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the template
        Returns:
        DungeonTemplate

      • createTemplate

        public void createTemplate(MultiValueSet dungeonStat)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Retrieve ID from MultiValueSet, if not other template with this ID exists, call DungeonTemplate constructor and add the returned object to the list.
        Parameters:
        dungeonStat - MultiValueSet containing all information about the template
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If template with this id already exists

      • displayTemplateList

        public void displayTemplateList()
        Iterate on the Map _templateList and call DungeonTemplate.displayTemplate() for each template.

      • getTemplateList

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,DungeonTemplate> getTemplateList()
        Return the Map containing all DungeonTemplate.
        Returns:
        Map

      • getAvailableDungeon

        public java.util.ArrayList<DungeonTemplate> getAvailableDungeon(Hero hero)
        Return an ArrayList containing all dungeons the player has unlocked. Obviously required level and other conditions are checked before.
        Parameters:
        hero - the hero that want to see his available dungeon
        Returns:
        ArrayList
